title: RHONY Gone Wild + A Refreshed RHOBH, Bali from Family Karma, & Queen Linda Updates Us
itunes:title: RHONY Gone Wild + A Refreshed RHOBH, Bali from Family Karma, & Queen Linda Updates Us
itunes:subtitle: It's a jam-packed Everything Iconic. I breakdown this week's beautifully unhinged Real Housewives of New York. On Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, the producers continue to give us a great show that pulls back the curtain on reality TV. Bali...
description:
It's a jam-packed Everything Iconic. I breakdown this week's beautifully unhinged Real Housewives of New York. On Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, the producers continue to give us a great show that pulls back the curtain on reality TV. Bali from Bravo's Family Karma calls in to preview the upcoming finale. Finally, Queen/Icon/Legend Linda Pellegrino updates us on her bold-ass woodpecker.


Linda P-- 1:00ish

RHONY-- 5:30ish

RHOBH-- 36:38ish

Bali (Family Karma) Interview-- 50:54ish


YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/dannypellegrino1

For tickets to the Chicago live show: https://bit.ly/3bc6QLX

*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:

Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino

Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino

Facebook.com/PellegrinoDanny

Cameo.com/DannyPellegrino

T-shirts: EverythingIconic.store/

EverythingIconic.com

*Sponsored by SamsonTech.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
